fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Intellectual property rights, audiovisual market. Copyright directive, enforcement directive, e-commerce directive.
organisation_name: FEDERACION PARA LA PROTECCION DE LA PROPIEDAD INTELECTUAL (FAP)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
FAP was founded in 1984 and participated in the ellaboration of the Spanish IP law of 1987 actively proposing antipiracy legal regulation. 
FAP has assisted thousands of judicial raids against audiovisual piracy. 
FAP has coordinated private prosecution of copyright infringement. 
FAP has organised regularly seminars and conferences on IP righs for Judges, public prosecutors, police forces and other public institutions.
